mapper.select: SELECT mem.user_no, mem.user_id, user_pass, user_nickname, mem.user_name, category_list, user_email_key, auth_type FROM user_tb mem LEFT OUTER JOIN auth_tb auth on mem.user_id = auth.user_id WHERE mem.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT count(*) FROM user_tb WHERE user_id = #{userId} and user_email_key != 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into user_tb(user_id, user_pass, user_nickname, user_name, category_list, user_email_key) values (#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userNickname}, #{userName}, #{categoryList}, #{userEmailKey})
